body:
Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux Wheezy

Kiln Walker is a 0/3 artifact creature that gets +3/+0 when it attacks. But AI repeatedly fails to attack me with it, even when it couldn't be blocked.

This probably affects other 0/X creatures that get a bonus when attacking.
author: [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/)
title: AI doesn't understand Kiln Walker
content:
_From [jaze...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/102707833900773093014/) on June 25, 2012 14:56:44_

Magarena 1.26, Debian Linux Wheezy

Kiln Walker is a 0/3 artifact creature that gets +3/+0 when it attacks. But AI repeatedly fails to attack me with it, even when it couldn't be blocked.

This probably affects other 0/X creatures that get a bonus when attacking.

**Attachment:** [kilnwalker.jpg](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=237)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=237_
